original_text: People like that even killed the Lord Jesus. They killed God's prophets, too. They also did bad things against us, so that we had to leave their towns. They make God become angry. They are enemies of all people, 16 because they try to stop us speaking to Gentiles. They do not want God to save anyone from another nation. In this way, they continue to do more and more bad things. When their sins become too many, God has to stop them. He has become so angry that he has punished them completely.
korean_text: 유대인은 주 예수와 선지자들을 죽이고 우리를 쫓아내고 하나님을 기쁘시게 하지 아니하고 모든 사람에게 대적이 되어

sentences.original_text: People like that even killed the Lord Jesus
They also did bad things against us
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 우리에게 나쁜 짓을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: so that we had to leave their towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 그들의 도시를 떠나야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They are enemies of all people
because they try to stop us speaking to Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 우리가 이방인에게 말하는 것을 막으려 하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: They do not want God to save anyone from another nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 다른 민족의 누구도 구원하기를 원하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: In this way, they continue to do more and more bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 방식으로, 그들은 점점 더 많은 나쁜 짓을 계속합니다

sentences.original_text: When their sins become too many
He has become so angry that he has punished them completely
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너무 화가 나셔서 그들을 완전히 벌하셨습니다
